definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Metaphysic is the finding of bad reasons for what we believe on instinct.
sentences.chinese: 形而上學是我們爲相信直覺而找到的壞理由。

sentences.english: In criticizing and transcending over traditional metaphysics, Heidegger and Whitehead adopted different approaches but yielded the same excellent results.
sentences.chinese: 二者對傳統形而上學的批判與超越具有異工同曲之妙。

sentences.english: Examining Wu shows that Lanai is metaphysics.
sentences.chinese: 對“無”的追問表明《老子》是形而上學。

sentences.english: MouZongsan's emphasis is metaphysics , stressing the experiencing content of practicing.
sentences.chinese: 牟宗三以形而上學爲中心，強調實踐的內容的體證。

sentences.english: However, he was majorly from a "metaphysical" point of view.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他主要是“形而上學”的觀點。

sentences.english: We need to ask about the metaphysics of the soul,can souls split?
sentences.chinese: 一個關於靈魂的形而上學的問題，靈魂能夠分裂嗎？

sentences.english: One, metaphysically, are bodies and souls distinct?
sentences.chinese: 第一，形而上學的，身體和靈魂完全分離截然不同嗎？

sentences.english: A morning-glory at my window satisfies me more than the metaphysics of books.
sentences.chinese: 窗口的燦爛的早晨比書中的形而上學更令我滿意。

sentences.english: Promote materialist dialectics and oppose metaphysics and scholasticism .
sentences.chinese: 要提倡唯物辯證法，反對形而上學和煩瑣哲學。

sentences.english: Well,maybe that metahphysical claim I just made should be abandoned.
sentences.chinese: 也許我剛纔提出的形而上學表述應該被摒棄。

sentences.english: Therefore, Jang Fuzhi's esthetical image theory profoundly contains a value of metaphysics.
sentences.chinese: 王夫之審美意象說蘊含深邃的價值形而上學色彩。

sentences.english: It seems to violate one of the fundamental metaphysical things about how people work.
sentences.chinese: 這似乎違背了形而上學理論關於人存在的基本概念。

sentences.english: That's where we're at in terms of the metaphysics.
sentences.chinese: 形而上學來說就是這樣。

sentences.english: Metaphysics of language is closely related to the development of pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 語言形而上學與語用學的發展息息相關。

sentences.english: Promote materialist dialectics and oppose metaphysics and scholasticism.
sentences.chinese: 要提倡唯物辯證法，反對形而上學和煩瑣哲學。

sentences.english: Kant criticized the metaphysical dogmatism both in synchronic and diachronic way.
sentences.chinese: 康德從歷時和共時兩方面理性批判了形而上學獨斷論。

definition: the philosophy of materialism, doctrine that physical matter is the whole of reality
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
